title: How to Kiss Someone During Hide And Seek or Sardines

steps.headline: Make sure he/she likes you back.
steps.description: If not, that could be quite disastrous.

steps.headline: When playing, subtly follow him/her around so you know where (s)he's hiding.
steps.description: You don't want them to think that you're stalking them, though.

steps.headline: Wait for when he/she hides in a place that only the two of you can fit into and you're hidden well.
steps.description: Preferably a small, dark space that you have to crouch down to get in, such as between bushes or behind a car.

steps.headline: If you're playing Sardines, say hi (quietly) and crouch down with him/her.
If you're playing Hide-and-Seek, mention that you can't find anywhere else and it's just a game.
Position yourself so you're facing them and you are able to look straight into their eyes.
steps.description: If they keep on looking into yours too, that's a good sign.

steps.headline: Notice how pretty the sky is or how cold it is.
steps.description: Don't suggest that you move closer together; just do it.

steps.headline: "Accidentally" touch hands.
steps.description: Then look into their eyes. If you lean in for a kiss, make sure that he/she is too. Otherwise, this could be quite awkward.

steps.headline: If you kiss him/her, congratulations!
steps.description: If he/she doesn't want to kiss you, forget about it and wait to be found.

text: Make sure he/she likes you back. If not, that could be quite disastrous. When playing, subtly follow him/her around so you know where (s)he's hiding. You don't want them to think that you're stalking them, though. Wait for when he/she hides in a place that only the two of you can fit into and you're hidden well. Preferably a small, dark space that you have to crouch down to get in, such as between bushes or behind a car. If you're playing Sardines, say hi (quietly) and crouch down with him/her.  If you're playing Hide-and-Seek, mention that you can't find anywhere else and it's just a game.  Position yourself so you're facing them and you are able to look straight into their eyes. If they keep on looking into yours too, that's a good sign. Notice how pretty the sky is or how cold it is. Don't suggest that you move closer together; just do it. "Accidentally" touch hands. Then look into their eyes. If you lean in for a kiss, make sure that he/she is too. Otherwise, this could be quite awkward. If you kiss him/her, congratulations! If he/she doesn't want to kiss you, forget about it and wait to be found.
